messages.title: LIB DEMS & LABOUR RUN FROM PUBLIC DEBATE
messages.content: LIMP LIB DEM & LABOUR CANDIDATES AFRAID TO DEBATE THEIR POLICIES. A hustings for our constituency was called off after Labour and Lib Dem candidates refused to take to the stage.

messages.title: LIB DEMS: MORE POUNDS IN THEIR POCKETS
messages.content: In times of hardship, Liberal Democrat Councillors vote for unbelievable 3.7% increase in their allowances.

housing.content: Liberal Democrat Councillors vote for unbelievable 3.7% increase in their allowances.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have never run away from my political opponents and do not intend to do so now.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticises the Lib Dem and Labour candidates for not participating in a public debate. It also attacks the Lib Dems for voting for an increase in their allowances during tough economic times. Additional assertions such as 'dirty tricks' and 'being cynical and greedy' are mentioned.
